name: judgeval-claude-plugin
description: Judgeval plugins for LLM evaluation, logging, and observability

plugins.name: judgeval
plugins.description: Enables AI agents to use Judgeval for LLM evaluation, logging, and observability. Provides correct API usage, working examples, and helper scripts.

plugins.name: trace-claude-code
plugins.description: Automatically trace Claude Code conversations to Judgeval. Captures user messages, assistant responses, and tool calls for observability.
